amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds relating to a certain definition.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3811, under the order of 4/20/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 57.

action.text: Amendment SA 3811 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2322-2323; text: CR S2322-2311) To prohibit the use of funds relating to a certain definition.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3811 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 3801.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3811, under the order of 4/20/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 57.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3811, under the order of 4/20/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 57.
